mapper.select:
SELECT a.refundID,b.orderID,a.applicationTime,c.userRealName,d.serviceTitle, b.totalPrice,a.auditStatus,a.adminStatus,a.auditTime,a.adminTime,a.businessRemarks,a.adminRemarks, a.point,a.refundReason,a.refundImg,a.applyRefundMoney,a.ActualRefundMoney,a.refundExplain,a.userID AS sjid,d.userID AS yhid FROM refund AS a JOIN orders AS b ON a.`orderID`=b.`orderID` JOIN `user` AS c ON a.`userID`=c.`userID` JOIN services AS d ON d.`serviceID`=b.`serviceID`
and c.userRealName=name
and a.refundID=0

update.if: UPDATE refund SET ActualRefundMoney=#{qi}-#{qi}*0.1, adminStatus=2 WHERE refundID=#{rid};
UPDATE refund SET ActualRefundMoney=0, adminStatus=2 WHERE refundID=#{rid};
